search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Sonix (sonix.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Sonix is: [https://sonix.ai/pricing](https://sonix.ai/pricing) .

Sonix Pricing Plans: Discover the Perfect Plan for Your Needs ![Image 22: 📔](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/twemoji/11.1.0/2/svg/1f4d4.svg) ================================================================================================================================ Plans Built for Value and Versatility ------------------------------------- Our Premium plan is the most popular, offering team collaboration, AI-powered analysis, and significant cost savings to boost your organization’s productivity. Monthly billing **Annual billing** Save 25% | | Standard -------- Pay-as-you-go simplicity. Transcribe anytime, anywhere. [Buy Standard](https://sonix.ai/buy-standard) | Most Popular Premium ------- Subscription savings and team tools. Collaborate seamlessly. [Buy Premium](https://sonix.ai/buy-premium) | Enterprise ---------- High-volume power. Advanced controls and deep content insights. [Contact Sales](https://sonix.ai/enterprise#contact-enterprise-sales) | | --- | --- | --- | --- | | Pricing | | Users_Single-user and multi-user flexibility_ | Single-user only | Multi-user (1+ seats) | Multi-user (5+ seats) | | Platform Price_Affordable, scalable pricing for teams of all sizes_ | $0 per month | $22 per seat per monthMonthly $16.50 per seat per monthAnnual | Custom | | AI Transcription_World's most accurate AI transcription engine_ | $10 per hour | $5 per hour Save 50% | Custom | | AI Translation_Fast, efficient, and accurate translation_ | $10 per hour | $3 per hour Save 70% | Custom | | AI-Analysis_World class AI analysis across all your transcripts_ | Not included | $5 per month | Custom | | Platform features | | Media Storage_Secure, flexible storage for all your media needs_ | 10 GBCompressed | 100 GBOriginal | 1 TB+Original | | Support_Reliable, responsive support to keep you on track_ | Email support | Priority email support | Dedicated account manager | | Key product features | | Speaker diarization & timestamps_Precise speaker identification with detailed timestamps_ | Included | Included | Included | | Powerful in-browser editor_Audio/video stitched to text for easy editing_ | Included | Included | Included | | Custom dictionary_Enhance accuracy with personalized terms using a custom dictionary_ | Not included | Included | Included | | Unlimited exports_Export your files effortlessly, without limits_ | Not included | Included | Included | | API Access_Seamlessly integrate workflows with powerful, flexible API access_ | Not included | Included | Included | | SSO / SAML_Simplify secure team access with SAML single sign-on_ | Not included | Not included | Included | | Advanced user management_Efficiently manage permissions and access with advanced user controls_ | Not included | Not included | Included | [Compare all features](https://sonix.ai/pricing/detailed-pricing-and-features) ### Not sure which plan is right for you? Whether you’re exploring options or have unique enterprise needs, [our sales team](https://sonix.ai/enterprise#contact-enterprise-sales) is here to guide you every step of the way so you find the perfect fit. Common pricing questions ![Image 23: 💬](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/twemoji/11.1.0/2/svg/1f4ac.svg) --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ### What is the difference between your plans? The Standard plan is a single-user pay-as-you-go plan. You purchase transcription hours up front and use them as you need them. This is perfect if you have a small transcription project. The Premium and Enterprise plans are multi-user subscription plans. You pay a monthly or yearly subscription. In addition to this, you pay a transcription fee per hour. This is ideal if you have a higher volume of transcription or collaborate with people inside or outside your organization. ### What do you mean by hourly rate? Is it length of audio/video, time to transcribe, or time on the Sonix website? “Per hour” of transcription relates to the length of audio or video file that you upload, not the length of time to transcribe or the length of time you use the software. We prorate your “per hour” transcription down to the nearest second so you only pay for what you use. For example, if you transcribe a video file that is 52 minutes, you will only be charged for 52 minutes, not a full hour. ### Are there additional charges for translation? Yes, automated translation is an extra charge. It is charged at the same rate as your transcription rate. The same applies to alignment and burn-in subtitling. ### How are my free minutes applied? Every new account comes with 30 free minutes. If you purchase minutes and you still have free minutes remaining, the free minutes will be applied to your first upload. ### Can I cancel my subscription plan anytime? Yes, you can stop your Premium or Enterprise subscription by clicking 'cancel subscription'. This will stop you from being billed again. You can do this from your account page: [https://my.sonix.ai/account](https://my.sonix.ai/account) Up until the anniversary of your subscription, you'll still be able to upload and transcribe new files. ### Do you offer any discounts? Yes, we do. If you are a student, teacher/professor, faculty member, or work at a non-profit, we have [special discounted pricing for you](https://sonix.ai/discounts). Lastly, if you [write a 300+ word online article about Sonix](https://sonix.ai/write-about-sonix), we can provide you with a heavily discounted subscription to our Premium Plan. ### Do you have any discounts for high volume transcription? [Contact our enterprise team](https://sonix.ai/enterprise) if you transcribe over 1,000 hours per year and they can assist you. ### What's the fine print? There isn't any. It's that simple. Sonix pricing philosophy ![Image 24: 🍻](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/twemoji/11.1.0/2/svg/1f37b.svg) --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ![Image 25: No tricks, only treats. Sonix core philosophy: Treat people the way that you want to be treated.](https://sonix.ai/packs/media/images/corp/illustrations/simple/thin_search-0085-4e322fcc5a800b11f9060fe86b98b3a5.svg) Transparent pricing ------------------- [How much does transcription cost?](https://sonix.ai/how-much-does-transcription-cost) No fine print. No hidden charges. You'll always know what your charges are. ![Image 26: Try Sonix before you subscribe. Take us for a test drive.](https://sonix.ai/packs/media/images/corp/illustrations/simple/thin_dashboard-0484-ca045b513773abdd2a7b70469146b3fc.svg) Free trial ---------- Will Sonix work for me? See for yourself! Your trial account includes 30 minutes of transcription for free. ![Image 27: No confusing directions. Getting started should be as easy as possible.](https://sonix.ai/packs/media/images/corp/illustrations/simple/thin_sign-0541-bce081fe2b92667df00eb050b72a298b.svg) Easy setup ---------- What do I need to get started? Setting up your account takes just a minute. No credit card required. Cancel or delete your account anytime. The best automated transcription service in 2025 ![Image 28: 🚀](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/twemoji/11.1.0/2/svg/1f680.svg) -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ### Easily convert your audio to text with Sonix Sonix automatically transcribes, translates, and helps you organize your audio and video files in over 40 languages. Fast, accurate, and affordable. Millions of users from all over the world. [Try Sonix for free](https://sonix.ai/accounts/sign_up)Includes 30 minutes of free transcription ![Image 29: Let our support team help you with all of your automated transcription questions. Pictured: Christine Lee](https://sonix.ai/packs/media/images/corp/people/customer-support-christine-lee-phone-e78e391b873e242d3acd257edcd11f49.jpg) Transcribe and translate confidently, knowing you’re backed by our award-winning team, who is ready to answer your questions. Get immediate help by visiting our [Help Center](https://help.sonix.ai/en/), [resources](https://sonix.ai/resources/), [tutorials](https://sonix.ai/step-by-step-tutorials), [and Introduction to Sonix videos](https://sonix.ai/introduction-to-sonix). [Visit our Help Center](https://help.sonix.ai/en/) You might be interested in ![Image 30: 🤔](https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/twemoji/11.1.0/2/svg/1f914.svg)
